org.jscsi.initiator.taskbalancer
Class AbstractTaskBalancer

java.lang.Object
  org.jscsi.initiator.taskbalancer.AbstractTaskBalancer
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleTaskBalancer
public abstract class AbstractTaskBalancer
extends java.lang.Object

AbstractLoadBalancer

Each load balancer must extend this abstract class to support some basic features.

Author:
Volker Wildi
